refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the number of arguments passed to the function

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Returns the number of arguments passed into the current user-defined function. func_num_args will generate a warning if called from outside of a user-defined function.

informalexample.programlisting:
<?php
function foo() {
    $numargs = func_num_args();
    echo "Number of arguments: $numargs\n";
} 

foo (1, 2, 3);    // Prints 'Number of arguments: 3'
?>

refsect1.simpara: func_num_args may be used in conjunction with func_get_arg and func_get_args to allow user-defined functions to accept variable-length argument lists.
